Package dataProviders

Class ConfigFileReader

java.lang.Object
dataProviders.ConfigFileReader
public class ConfigFileReader extends Object
This class avoids hardcoding URLs, BrowserTypes, and others to be hardcoded in the code. It makes use of the Configuration.properties file to read certain things that are needed to run the code.

  • Field Summary

    Properties object to read to
    private final String

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigFileReader

      public ConfigFileReader()

  • Method Details

    • getImplicitlyWait

      public long getImplicitlyWait()
      Gets value of implicitly wait time of driver from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      long Time that driver should wait in seconds.

    • getApplicationHomeUrl

      public String getApplicationHomeUrl()
      Gets value of URL of the homepage of the application from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      String URL of the Homepage

    • getApplicationCoursesUrl

      public String getApplicationCoursesUrl()
      Gets value of URL of the page where all the courses are listed from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      String URL of the CoursesPage

    • getSoftwareTestingUrl

      public String getSoftwareTestingUrl()
      Gets value of URL of the page where information about the Software Testing course is specified from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      String URL of the Software testing page

    • getBrowser

      public DriverType getBrowser()
      Gets type of browser you want to run the test on from the Configuration.properties file. The different driver types are specified in enums.DriverType. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      DriverType type of driver to use

    • getEnvironment

      public EnvironmentType getEnvironment()
      Gets type of environment you want to run the test on from the Configuration.properties file. The different driver types are specified in enums.EnvironmentType. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      EnvironmentType type of environment to use

    • getBrowserWindowSize

      public Boolean getBrowserWindowSize()
      Gets value of windowMaximize from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      Boolean True if u want the browser to maximize the window while running the test

    • getDriverPath

      public String getDriverPath()
      Gets value of driver path from the Configuration.properties file. Currently specified as the path to an installer driver for old versions of firefox If u want to use additional drivers, install them and specify in configuration file. Also adjust the code if needed in WebDriverManager. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      String File path to driver.exe u want to use while running test

    • getHeadLess

      public Boolean getHeadLess()
      Gets value of headless from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file. Note that running without head is not possible for all browsers, as specified in WebDriverManager.
      Returns:
      Boolean True when u want to run the tests without browser GUI

    • getReportConfigPath

      public String getReportConfigPath()
      Gets path to configuration file of Extent report, named extent-config.xml, from the Configuration.properties file. Gives exception when not specified in that file.
      Returns:
      String File path to configuration file of Extent reports
